clip.quote: Shifting from an evidence of action to an evidence of expertise is a tough thing to do, but once you do it, it's incredibly effective.
clip.why_clipworthy: It challenges agents to rethink their marketing approach.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you showcasing your expertise or just your activity?

clip.quote: The agents who are going to find the most success are the ones who can pivot away from being an opportunity vacuum cleaner.
clip.why_clipworthy: It offers a fresh perspective on how agents should approach their business.
clip.suggested_hook: Why being an opportunity vacuum cleaner won't work in 2023.
